job_history.work_description: Provide support to Columbia University community by providing excellent customer service via telephone, email and the self-service system. Responsible for resolving customer/ employees problems related to Human Resources, Payroll Labor Accounting transactions, Data, JACS and RAPS applications and Finance.

Responsible for supervising a group of over 120 employees and clients. Responsible for recruitment of employees, contractors, per-diem and interns. Responsible for employee development, employee evaluations and relations.

In charge of 80+ cases for women and families in the homeless shelter system. In charge of interviewing clients and doing their admission assessment. Worked closely with housing and employment specialists in helping clients obtain employment and permanent housing.

skills.name: Human Resource Management
skills.explanation: Has over a decade of experience in human resources, including supervising large teams, recruitment, employee development, and relations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided excellent customer service to a large community via multiple channels, showing strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll labor accounting transactions, indicating a solid working proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised large teams in multiple roles, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Responsible for recruitment of employees, contractors, per-diem, and interns, indicating strong proficiency in recruitment.

skills.name: Employee Development
skills.explanation: Responsible for employee development, employee evaluations, and relations, showing strong proficiency in employee development.

skills.name: Case Management
skills.explanation: In charge of managing over 80 cases, indicating a solid working proficiency in case management.

skills.name: Counseling
skills.explanation: Worked as a counselor, helping clients obtain employment and permanent housing, showing a solid working proficiency in counseling.
